tool_description: Manages comprehensive medication records including current prescriptions, dosages, adherence tracking, and interaction checking.

medication_name.description: Generic or brand name of the medication

dosage.description: Medication dosage including strength and unit

frequency.description: How often medication is taken (e.g., BID, TID, QID, Daily, PRN)

route.description: Route of administration: Oral, IV, IM, Topical, Sublingual, Inhalation

indication.description: Medical condition or reason for the medication

adherence_status.description: Patient adherence: Excellent, Good, Fair, Poor, Unknown

side_effects.description: Reported side effects or adverse reactions

error_messages: Patient not found: patient_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid route: Use one of [Oral, IV, IM, Topical, Sublingual, Inhalation].
Invalid adherence status: Use one of [Excellent, Good, Fair, Poor, Unknown].
Invalid date format: start_date and end_date must be in ISO 8601 format.
Date logic error: end_date cannot be earlier than start_date.
Missing required fields: All required medication information must be provided.
Medication not recognized: medication_name may contain spelling errors or be invalid.
usage: Provide complete medication information including patient_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency, route, start_date, prescribing_provider, and indication. Optionally add end_date, adherence_status, and side_effects.

medication_id.description: Unique identifier for this medication record

interaction_warnings.description: Drug interaction warnings with other patient medications

allergy_alerts.description: Alerts for known patient allergies to this medication

duration_days.description: Number of days medication has been prescribed

record_created.description: Timestamp when medication record was created
